test.name: Executar MIGO

kw.name: Prepare SAP
Connect to Running SAP
kw.msg: Connected to a running SAP instance.
kw.doc: Connect to an already running SAP instance and take control of it.

kw.name: Maximize window
kw.msg: The window in the foreground was maximized.
kw.doc: Maximize the window in the foreground.
Conecta ao SAP

kw.name: Close Workbook
kw.doc: Close the active workbook.

kw.name: Abrir Planilha de Dados de Teste
Join Path
kw.msg: ${caminho_planilha} = C:\Users\ETH6\OneDrive - VIBRA\Documentos\GitHub\testeS4\Dados\Dados apresentação 22-08.xlsx
kw.doc: Joins the given path part(s) to the given base path.

kw.name: Open Workbook
kw.msg: Opened workbook: <RPA.Excel.Files.XlsxWorkbook object at 0x000002B0B0E2C4A0>
kw.doc: Open an existing Excel workbook.
Abre o arquivo Excel com os dados para a execução dos casos de teste.

kw.name: Read Worksheet As Table
kw.msg: Created table: Table(columns=['Pedido Origem', 'Preço', 'TIP DE PEDIDO', 'FORNECEDOR', 'COND.PAG', 'INCOTERM', 'ORG. COMPRAS', 'GP. COMPRADOR', 'EMPRESA', 'MATERIAL', 'QNTD', 'CENTRO', 'TP CONTRATO', 'ITEM CONT.', 'Data de Remessa', 'NV CONTRATO', 'NV PEDIDO', 'MIGO', 'MIRO'], rows=2)

${testData} = Table(columns=['Pedido Origem', 'Preço', 'TIP DE PEDIDO', 'FORNECEDOR', 'COND.PAG', 'INCOTERM', 'ORG. COMPRAS', 'GP. COMPRADOR', 'EMPRESA', 'MATERIAL', 'QNTD', 'CENTRO', 'TP CONTRATO', 'ITEM CONT.', '...
kw.doc: Read the contents of a worksheet into a Table container. Allows sorting/filtering/manipulating using the ``RPA.Tables`` library.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Execute Transaction
kw.msg: The transaction with T-Code /nmigo was executed.
kw.doc: Execute the transaction with the given T-Code.

kw.name: Fill Purchase Order Details
Fill Text Field
kw.msg: The text field with the locator 'Nº do documento de compras' was filled.
kw.doc: Fill the text field specified by the locator with the content provided.

kw.name: Press Key Combination
kw.msg: The key combination 'Enter' was pressed.
kw.doc: Press the given key combination.
Preenche o número do documento de compra

kw.name: Configure Item Details
Select Tab
kw.msg: The tab 'Od' was selected.
kw.doc: Select the tab with the name provided.

kw.name: Fill Text Field
kw.msg: The text field with the locator 'Depósito' was filled.
kw.doc: Fill the text field specified by the locator with the content provided.

kw.name: Press Key Combination
kw.msg: The key combination 'Enter' was pressed.
kw.doc: Press the given key combination.

kw.name: Select Tab
kw.msg: The tab 'Quantidades adiciona' was selected.
kw.doc: Select the tab with the name provided.

kw.name: Tick Checkbox
kw.msg: The checkbox with the locator 'Item é transferido para o documento' was ticked.
kw.arg: Item é transferido para o documento
kw.doc: Tick the checkbox specified by the locator.
Configura a localização de armazenamento e a caixa de seleção de detalhes

kw.name: Set Delivery Note
Fill Text Field
kw.msg: The text field with the locator 'Nº nota de remessa externa' was filled.
kw.doc: Fill the text field specified by the locator with the content provided.

kw.name: Press Key Combination
kw.msg: The key combination 'Enter' was pressed.
kw.doc: Press the given key combination.
Preenche o número da nota de remessa

kw.name: Save Transaction
Press Key Combination
kw.msg: The key combination 'Ctrl+S' was pressed.
kw.doc: Press the given key combination.

kw.name: Read Statusbar
kw.msg: The statusbar was read.
${statusbar} = {'status': 'Empty', 'message': ''}
kw.doc: Read the contents of the statusbar. The return value is a dictionary with the entries 'status' and 'message'.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: MIGO Executada com sucesso. Documento de material: {'status': 'Empty', 'message': ''}
kw.arg: MIGO Executada com sucesso. Documento de material: ${statusbar}
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
Salva a transação MIGO

kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
